programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Sundel Bolong
programme.desc: Sundel bolong mengisahkan tentang hantu pelacuran Jawa dari mitologi Indonesia yang mempunyai semangat pendendam, yang bangun untuk membalas dendam kepada musuhnya.

programme.title: Pak Tam Duda
programme.desc: seorang duda dan usahawan yang berjaya di dalam kampungnya . Dia juga dihormati oleh orang-orang kampung kerana kebaikan dan kemurahan hatinya . muncul seorang gadis bandar serta teman lelakinya yang mempunyai niat jahat untuk menggoda dan mengikis segala wang dan harta lelaki itu.

programme.title: Kisah Guru Honorer Yang Berikrar Membangun Sekolah Gratis
programme.desc: Ika menolak sekeras-kerasnya permintaan Marwan untuk membeli tanah sekolahnya untuk dijadikan pusat beli-belah. Memandangkan dia menolak, Marwan melakukan apa sahaja untuk mendapatkan tanah sekolah itu daripada Ika.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep56
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Semarak Indosiar 2021 Ep18
programme.desc: Kemeriahan pentas Indosiar tetap hadir dengan keindahan budaya Indonesia dalam rancangan Indosiar Semarak 2021. Iringi malam anda dengan persembahan yang menakjubkan daripada artis serta penyanyi dari ibu kota.

programme.title: Cinta Misteri Ep43
programme.desc: Seorang gadis bernama Kinanti yang baru berpindah ke Jakarta dan bersekolah di sekolah antarabangsa. Walaupun ada orang yang tidak menyukainya, dia berkawan dengan ramai pelajar. Kinanti juga berkawan dengan seorang gadis bernama Dinda. Rupanya, Dinda adalah hantu yang menetap di sekolah itu. Sejak itu, Kinanti dan rakannya sering berurusan dengan hantu. Sering kali mereka mengalami pengembaraan menarik yang berkaitan dengan dunia mistik.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep45
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep88
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Dari Anak Penjual Papeda Keliling Menjadi Manager Sukses
programme.desc: Firman menerima biasiswa di universiti terkenal, tetapi dia terpaksa membayar separuh daripada jumlah itu, yang merupakan jumlah yang agak besar baginya. Firman tertanya-tanya sama ada bapanya, seorang penjual Papeda, mampu membiayai pengajiannya.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep77
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Jejak Misteri Ep12
programme.desc: Jejak Misteri ialah sebuah rancangan realiti bergenre misteri di mana setiap episod menyajikan liputan pelbagai tempat, bangunan dan tapak bersejarah yang bukan sahaja menyimpan kisah-kisah bersejarah, malah turut meninggalkan kisah-kisah mistik.

programme.title: Di Sebelah Ada Surga Ep12
programme.desc: Di Sebelah Ada Surga menceritakan tentang 3 pemuda iaitu Andika, Gading, dan Uus. Kehidupan rohaniah mereka dikatakan masih kurang. Masa muda mereka telah diisikan dengan santai tanpa mempedulikan masa depan. Mereka sibuk mengejar keseronokan duniawi yang tipikal dari golongan belia hari ini.

programme.title: Dari Anak Penjual Papeda Keliling Menjadi Manager Sukses
programme.desc: Firman menerima biasiswa di universiti terkenal, tetapi dia terpaksa membayar separuh daripada jumlah itu, yang merupakan jumlah yang agak besar baginya. Firman tertanya-tanya sama ada bapanya, seorang penjual Papeda, mampu membiayai pengajiannya.

programme.desc: Mampukah Yuda memaafkan bekas kekasihnya yang bakal berkahwin dengan kawannya sendiri?

programme.title: Demi Oppa Ganteng Dari Korya
programme.desc: Cila tergila-gilakan Oppa Korea. Sebagai peminat tegar, dia sukar untuk mencari jodoh. Namun, apabila dia bertemu dengan Dudun, seorang tukang penyapu jalanan, dia amat menyukainya kerana dia kelihatan seperti Oppa Korea!

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep88

Dengan tagline "Be Pop Academy and Be A Super Stars", Pop Academy bertujuan untuk mencari idola baru dalam dunia muzik pop Indonesia.

programme.title: The Sultan Ep35
programme.desc: The Sultan adalah rancangan bual bicara yang menampilkan dua pengacara yang kaya bak Sultan, iaitu Sultan Andara-Raffi Ahmad dan Sultan Bintaro-Andre Taulany dan ditemani oleh pengawal yang cantik dan tampan. Rancangan ini turut menampilkan bintang-bintang tetamu Indonesia yang terkenal.

programme.title: The Merciless
programme.desc: A notorious gangster teams up with a prison newbie to take over the crime ring, yet the trust between shaken when their ulterior motives come to light.

programme.title: The Classified File
programme.desc: A veteran detective and a fortune teller form an unlikely partnership in order to rescue a kidnapped child before it's too late.

programme.title: Waiting For Rain
programme.desc: An unmotivated student regains his passion for life after exchanging letters with his childhood friend and promise to meet if it rains on December 31st each year.

programme.title: By Quantum Physics: A Nightlife Venture
programme.desc: A nightclub owner, his club manager and a police officer must wash their hands off a drug abuse case that involves high-profile figures, in order to save their own lives.

programme.title: Ditto
programme.desc: A voice from the future echoes through an antique radio connects the two living 20 years apart and changed Yong's life forever.

programme.title: The Scam
programme.desc: Hyeon-Soo joins an elite team formed by a gangster-turned-investor who attempt their biggest scam to swindle $60,000,000 from the stock market.

programme.title: A Hard Day
programme.desc: After trying to cover up a car accident that left a man dead, a crooked homicide detective is stalked by a mysterious man claiming to have witnessed the event.

programme.title: Athena: Goddess Of War
programme.desc: Set in the same murky world as IRIS, a new group of agents must face off against terrorists and untangle a dangerous conspiracy threatening national security.

programme.title: War Of The Arrows
programme.desc: Set during the second Manchu invasion of Korea, Nam Yi, the best archer in Korea, goes up against the Qing Dynasty to rescue his younger sister Ja In - who was to be enslaved by the Manchurians.

programme.title: Dancing Queen
programme.desc: A married couple in the midst of their mundane lives decides to pursue their lost dreams. The husband finds himself accidentally running for Mayor of Seoul and his wife decides to become a pop singer.

programme.title: South Bound
programme.desc: Choi Hae-gap has a family who will stand by his decisions given any scenario. As a team, they fight the government's plans to build a resort on the island of their ancestors.

programme.title: 6/45: Lucky Lotto
programme.desc: The excitement of winning a lottery ticket doesn’t last long for sergeant Chun-woo as it accidentally ends up crossing the Military Demarcation Line. He must get his act together and find it again!

programme.title: Recalled
programme.desc: Suffering from memory loss after an accident, Soo-jin begins to see eerie visions of murderous events. She grows suspicious of her husband after seeing a vision of him killing their neighbor…

programme.title: My Girlfriend Is An Agent
programme.desc: A secret agent couple goes behind each other’s backs, unknowingly on the same mission to stop a Russian organized crime ring from stealing an advanced bio-chemical weapon.

programme.title: My Sassy Girl
programme.desc: A young man sees a drunk, cute woman standing too close to the tracks at a metro station in Seoul and pulls her back. She ends up getting him into trouble repeatedly after that, starting on the train.

programme.title: The Closet
programme.desc: After losing his wife, a father tries to start over in a new home with his daughter. But things take a turn when strange noises trickle out of the closet, and his daughter goes missing.

programme.title: My Paparotti
programme.desc: A music teacher was asked to train Jang-Ho, a teenage gangster dreamed of being a world-class singer. Yet conflict arises between two local gangs and Jang-ho was forced into a difficult situation.

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Last 49 Days
programme.desc: The three grim reapers will guide their 49th soul Kim Soo-Hong to the underworld trials. Meanwhile, God of House will recover the grim reapers' memories from 1,000 years ago.

programme.title: Decision To Leave
programme.desc: When detective Hae-Joon investigates the death of a man who fell from a mountaintop and meets his wife Seo-rae, he starts to suspect her at the same time that he begins feeling an attraction to her.

programme.title: Part-Time Spy
programme.desc: A former contract worker at the National Security Agency works with an undercover detective to recover money that was stolen from her boss in a voice phishing scheme.

programme.title: Pain
programme.desc: A debt collector who has lost his sense of pain after a traumatic accident during his youth falls for a street vendor who suffers from severe hemophilia.

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep939940
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1033
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3358
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45474548
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1033
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep941942
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45474548
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep39
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Way to Health(M) Ep179180
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about one’s health.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep432
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Let’s Go Crazy on Live!(M) Ep67
programme.desc: When the news reached her that the old village leader had passed away, Xiao Li, who was a personal shopper, stuffed a few things into her Hermes bag and, clutching the lucky salt he had once given her, set out for her home town wearing her Prada high-heeled shoes. That night A-Jian, who was helping out in a Japanese restaurant, also jumped on the bus and headed home as soon as he received the news. In his will, the old man divided up his salt fields among the villagers, but on the condition that A-Jian and Xiao Li get married. When they heard this, A-Jian and Xiao Li found themselves immediately surrounded…

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1033
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep39

programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about one’s health.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep432
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Let’s Go Crazy on Live!(M) Ep67
programme.desc: As an ordinary girl, working an ordinary job, at an ordinary convenience store, Lin An An had only one dream in life: to find a good, stable, government job so she could support her aging grandfather. With that single dream in mind, An An never even thought of becoming anything more than the ordinary girl she had always been. But all that changed the day You Yuan Le walked into her life.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1033
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep1033
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep804805
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep656
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep433
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Young Days No Fears(M) Ep67
programme.desc: The six girls, as good friends, have gone through their difficulties and crises in relationship, at work, and in their marriage together. Despite many challenges in life, they are not afraid. They have got each other’s back.

programme.title: When Sun Meets Moon
programme.desc: In 1992, a heavy rainstorm caused a massive power outage in Hong Kong. Two young astrology enthusiasts, Moon and Sun, met on that starry night and fell in love. However, the path to love is not an easy one and they would need to endure parental objections and overcome challenges from teachers and friends.

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 2
programme.desc: Qin Feng was tricked by Tang Ran to participate in the "World Detective Contest" in New York's Chinatown. Their task is to find the murderer of the grandson of Godfather, Uncle Qi. When famous detectives from all over the world investigate the case, two other cases occurred with a very similar modus operandi…

programme.title: Namiya
programme.desc: Namiya is a Chinese adaptation of the novel, Miracles Of The Namiya General Store, by best-selling author, Keigo Higashino. When three runaways shack up in an abandoned general store, a supernatural correspondence connects them to many lives that were all touched by the owner of the store years before they were born.

programme.title: Tales from the Occult
programme.desc: The movie consists of three tales about the horrors lurking in dark corners of the city. A young pop star goes back into depression when spooky things happen in her new home; an online influencer performs live in a mall, but it ends up being a livestream of his death; the residents of a tenement building battle a mysterious figure in the stairwell.

programme.title: Bodies at Rest
programme.desc: When three armed criminals barge into a morgue, a forensic doctor and his student must fight with their lives to stop the criminals from obtaining a bullet from inside a corpse that is a key piece of evidence in a deadly crime.

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A 28-year-old IT geek has only been in love once. Surprisingly, he ends up getting romantically involved with five different women this year and the one thing they have in common is that they all live in far flung areas of Hong Kong. After taking five intensive relationship courses within these 365 days, will he find “the-one”?

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: The Eye

programme.title: Integrity
programme.desc: Anti-corruption senior officer Chen lines up a key witness, corporate accountant Jack, to testify against a tobacco trading company CEO for bribing high-level customs officer as well as smuggling contraband cigarettes. When neither Jack nor the CEO shows up on the day of the hearing, Chen must team up with his ex-wife to launch an investigation.

programme.title: Rhapsody of Kidnapping
programme.desc: When three tech founders end up handing over their latest inventions to a sleazy tycoon who takes them for granted, they decide to kidnap the man’s wife, mistress, love child and his grandma for a huge ransom. Little did they expect that the heartless tycoon has hired an assassin to take them out instead of paying the ransom.

programme.title: Sound of Colors
programme.desc: Lonesome marriage consultant Ming meets a blind but charming young lady, Yeuk, at a subway station. When Ming suddenly turns blind too, Yeuk helps him navigate through his world of darkness, and they begin to fall in love. This feature is based on the illustrated book from famous Taiwan illustrator Jimmy Liao.

programme.title: Love · Revolution
programme.desc: Ai Yoshida will do anything for love, including traveling to Thailand with her boyfriend from Japan to run dope. When her boyfriend is kidnapped by the local gangster after a brawl at a bar, Ai sets out on a rescue mission that sends her on an action-packed roller-coaster ride where she meets a professional assassin who breaks out of jail for love.

programme.title: Romantic Dream
programme.desc: Dino meets his dream girl Mandy and falls in love with her at first sight. However, she disappears suddenly and he only sees her again after nine years, when she is already married. To overcome the pain of losing his love, Dino finds a guru with supernatural power to make him meet Mandy in his dream.

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learns boxing from Uncle Xing, the boss of a boxing studio, since young and uses his skills to help the weak fight villains. When Xing’s son attempts drug trafficking to save his father’s studio but fails and is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge so as to help him take revenge.

programme.title: House of Flying Daggers
programme.desc: During Tang Dynasty, two police deputies are tasked to catch the new leader of a revolutionary faction known as the House of Flying Daggers. They capture a blind dancer suspected of being the daughter of the ex-leader but both fall in love with her. When passion turns into hatred and loyalty turns into betrayal, love will be the deadliest weapon!

programme.title: My Prince Edward
programme.desc: A newly engaged Hong Kong woman tries to rid herself of a secret sham marriage to a mainlander that she was paid for years ago, before she can get married for real. Winner of Best Original Film Score and Best New Director at the 39th Hong Kong Film Awards.

programme.title: Nightfall
programme.desc: Detective George Lam investigates the brutal death of a Sino-British conductor and suspects he is murdered by Wong Yuen Yeung, a dumb killer who has just been released from prison. When out on a manhunt for Wong, Lam finds more revelations to the contrary and has to pursue every possibility, taking him deep into Wong’s past.

programme.title: HK Lan Kwai Fong
programme.desc: Lee is the Production head of an advertising firm who tries to improve her team’s performance by competing with Creative head Chan in the day and clubbing at Lan Kwai Fong for ideas at night. Lee runs into her ex-boyfriend before a big commercial shoot and drowns her sorrows drinking at Lan Kwai Fong, but finally picks herself up with Chan’s help.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: An emergency occurs on an offshore drilling rig that would cause it to capsize and sink. The Emergency Response Unit races against the clock in a chopper rescue mission amidst dangerous explosions and fire. Captain Gao Qian must work seamlessly with his chopper pilot Zhao Cheng to rescue survivors using the most maverick and dangerous tactics.

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Special agent Nick (Daniel Wu), an undercover in the heart of Asia's lucrative heroin trade, is a Protégé to drug lord Quin (Andy Lau). In 8 years he eventually gains his trust and next in line to take over from his ill mentor. While Quin's health is going downhill, he plans to retire and unveils all his business secrets to Nick. When Nick infiltrates the syndicate to get enough evidence to arrest Quin, the unwritten law of brotherhood blurs with his professional duties. Nick finds himself corrupted by the easy money and his new found power. Unable to separate himself from his undercover identity, he is confused in moral dilemmas between justice, loyalty and true feeling from his soul in this illicit business.

programme.title: Legend of the Demon Cat
programme.desc: Adapted from a Japanese fantasy novel, a demon cat appears and breaks the peace of Chang'an city, causing a series of mysterious events. A poet and a Japanese monk band together to follow the trails left by the cat, leading them to discover a buried secret.

programme.title: The Lady Improper
programme.desc: Siu Man is divorced by her husband due to her fear of intimacy. After that, she wants to restart her life by taking over her father’s restaurant. Siu Man hires a new chef with unique culinary philosophy that revitalizes her. Tired of the shackles she placed on herself, Siu Man embarks on a journey of self-discovery and sexual liberation.

programme.title: Encroach
programme.desc: University freshman Zhen Xin finds her classmates, except You Mei, very unfriendly to her, and the two quickly became good friends. Zhen Xin lives in the dormitory and constantly hears strange noises. When she was attacked by a man in black, You Mei saved her and the latter’s identity is also revealed.

programme.title: My Kickass Wife
programme.desc: Jade is a beautiful royal guard who is set up for marriage by the Queen in order to avoid the King setting eyes on her. Jade falls for Sean and helps him win the contest for her. After the wedding, Sean discovers her bad temper and visits a brothel in his despair. He meets and is attracted to a girl there, not knowing she has a secret agenda...

programme.title: As Tears Go By
programme.desc: Mobsters Wah and Fly are buddies. Wah loves his cousin, but cannot make their relationship work as he is a mobster. Fly infuriates a mob boss one day and got beaten up badly, implicating Wah too. He then takes up a fatal task to make amends…

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: An extreme sports lover accidentally gets involved in an illegal trading activity by international crime syndicates. Led by international special agent Bruce, he forms an amateur unit with a police officer, an inventor and a doctor to fight the crime syndicates together, leading to a series of thrilling and hilarious adventures.

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: The movie is based on a real incident of Sichuan Airlines Flight 8633 on 14 May 2018. When the cockpit windshield shatters after takeoff, the Captain manages to land the airplane safely with his level-headed swift actions and sheer determination. This is lauded as a miracle in airline history.

programme.title: A Witness out of the Blue
programme.desc: The police suspects that a jewel thief, found dead in his unit with all stolen goods missing, is killed by his gang leader. They also found the crime to be related to a jewel robbery many months ago, with the robbers involved being killed off one by one. In this complicated case, the police’s only witness is a talking parrot from the crime scene.

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: Dad, I'm Sorry
programme.desc: Ba Sang lives in a poor district in Saigon and his son Woan is a Youtuber earning considerable income. Woan wants his father to enjoy retirement, so he is mad at him for being a meddler and making unnecessary sacrifices. This has created conflicts between the two generations and leads to a crisis in the father and son relationship.

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: Till We Meet Again
programme.desc: Ng Ka Wai is hoping that he will see his loving mother Mui again one day. Mui has apparently been avoiding her son for over a decade while Wai is suffering from depression and panic disorder. When his lost memory suddenly returns, he recalls what he has done to his mother - an unforgivable sin leading to the 10-year separation.

programme.title: Detective Dee and Nine-storey Demon Building
programme.desc: A series of strange incidents happen at the Tang’s demon building but Detective Dee finds no clue. Dee finds the master of the family suspicious when he speaks with him, and when the eldest daughter Miss Tang secretly informs Dee about Mr Tang’s strange behavior and the fact that she is kept under surveillance, Dee vows to unveil the truth.

programme.title: Invisible Target
programme.desc: Three young police officers driven by different motives decide to join forces to defeat Tien and his lethal, mercenary gang. As they team up to prevent another massive robbery, they discover that it is instigated by another unknown man. With courage, wits and dexterity, the trio are determined to not let Tien and the instigator escape.

programme.title: The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: Li Xun Huan is a sentimental swordsman who has lived peacefully outside the martial arts world for the past 10 years. He returns home after knowing that the Plum Blossom Bandit is back to his old tricks, only to find that everything has changed.

programme.title: The Perfumed Arrow
programme.desc: A charming Huangmei Opera title, this is the story of Fei E, a General’s daughter who grows up fooling everyone that she is a boy, including her two closest schoolmates. When she has to choose one of them to marry, how will Fei E tell them that she is a girl? To complicate matters, a girl who Fei E saves one day only wants to be married to her!

programme.title: Five Superfighters
programme.desc: A kung fu master and his three students lost everything after they are floored by a bully. To take revenge, the students find ways to learn from other kung fu masters and come back six months later to have a rematch with the bully.

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: The roguish scamp Zhen and his best friend Chia collects proof of corruption from the officials in this comedy-drama. After a string of blackmailing, they end up in positions of power, but what is to happen next?

programme.title: Legendary Weapons of China
programme.desc: Lei Kung, the leader of the Boxer Clan in Yunnan, dissolves the clan to save his disciples before going into self-exile. The Clan sends various assassins to kill him but failed. They then assigned Kung’s brother Yong to find and kill Kung, leading to a battle between the two brothers.

programme.title: Pale Passion
programme.desc: Fa is an obsessive man who loves his wife Ah Hsia but is easily jealous and abuses her. When she leaves him one day, Fa hooks up with another woman, Hsing. A deadly triangle develops when Fa runs into Ah Hsia again and decides to win her back…

programme.title: Dirty Ho
programme.desc: Master Wang, who is actually the 11th prince, poses as an antique connoisseur to hide his true identity. When he meets Dirty Ho, a witty con artist, Wang knows he has found the right man to help him untangle a royal succession plot...

programme.title: Return Of The Dead
programme.desc: A long-awaited horror sequel after Enchanted Shadow, this is about three asylum inmates telling their stories. In story one, a husband and wife discover they should be careful what they wish for. A naked female ghost seeks revenge from her watery grave in story two, and a dead prostitute returns as a ghost in the last tale.

programme.title: Twin Blades Of Doom
programme.desc: A retired martial artist is forced to return with a vengeance after his family and friends are murdered by the evil Ghost Gang. He decides to challenge the gang’s leader to a deadly duel so as to take revenge. Can he defeat the ruthless leader in the end?

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: Brave Archer And His Mate
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong raise the son of his sworn brother Yang Kang and named him Yang Guo. To prevent Yang Guo from taking revenge for his father’s death, Huang Rong bans him from learning martial arts. Yang Guo runs away from home in anger and encounters Ouyang Feng, who teaches him the “Toad Stance” and accidentally unveils his true identity…

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happily-ever-after?

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: Perils Of The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: The titanic team of Director Chu Yuan and Novelist Ku Lung chose to give their hero (Ti Lung) a whole new cliffhanger-fraught adventure featuring a mysterious swordsman, a sensual swordswoman, an imperial assassin, a ghost mansion, a booby-trapped tunnel, as well as double crosses and secret missions.

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: Masked Avengers
programme.desc: The "godfather of the kung-fu film," Chang Cheh, started a winning streak by making the internationally renowned THE FIVE VENOMS. He followed that hit with many more high-flying "bloody good" entertainments featuring the same cast in new roles. But of all the "Venom" movies, this one stands out as perhaps the most chilling. Masked killers are wreaking havoc and instilling terror with their vicious weapons of choice: razor-sharp, gut-shattering tridents. Only three fearless fighters dare investigate, leading to mass murder and magnificent martial arts. Chien Hsiao-hou, future co-star of Yuen Woo-ping's THE TAI-CHI MASTER joins the trio to get tri-pierced. The core "Venoms" themselves handle the intricate, always impressive, sometimes awe-inspiring, choreography in this unforgettable exercise in "grand guignol kung-fu."

programme.title: Let's Fall In Love
programme.desc: Da Yung, the son of a rich entrepreneur, meets Lian Lian, the niece of a kindergarten principal by chance. They get into a misunderstanding at the first meeting, causing Da Yung to lose his wallet. Further misunderstanding occurs when he tries to use her to act as his fiancé, in order to drive away two women whom he does not like…

programme.title: Return of the Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: One of Shaw Studio’s highest grossing movies ever, this is the story of Li Chin Huan, the renowned, charming and sentimental swordsman who must fight many opponents, including an evil Clan Chief, for a place in the martial arts world.

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Hua, a pretty fraud, steals a brilliant diamond ring from a shop in Hong Kong and escapes to Singapore. To smuggle the ring pass customs, Hua slips it into the pocket of a stranger, Yen, but then lost track of him. Hua finally spots Yen after searching for days and does everything to get close to him in order to take the ring back.

programme.title: Iron Bodyguard
programme.desc: Wang Wu, the head of a security firm Iron Bodyguard, meets a scholar who is a member of the Reformists, a group of scholars pressing for social reform in China at the end of the Qing dynasty. The Emperor actually supports such reforms but not the Empress Dowager. She orders the Reformists to be arrested and Wang Wu gets drawn into the politics.

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.title: The Shaolin Avengers
programme.desc: Hu seeks to avenge his father who is being killed by the White-Browed Hermit and his gang. However, he fails in his attempt and is saved by Fang Shi Yu, a youth from Shaolin whose parents are also killed by the same villains. They learn and master the advanced Shaolin style kung fu, before Fang leads Hu and the Shaolin fellows to fight the enemies.

programme.title: Intimate Confessions of a Chinese Courtesan
programme.desc: Young Ai Nu is abducted and sold to the popular Four Seasons brothel run by the powerful and ruthless Madam Chun Yi. Ai Nu gets locked up in a dungeon due to her fiery attitude. Soon, a murder occurs within the brothel and a policeman must race against time to prevent a vicious revenge plot from reaching its blood-spattered conclusion.

programme.title: Ten Tigers of Kwang Tung
programme.desc: The Ten Tigers of Kwang Tung is a group of anti-Ching martial artists who have killed a Ching official. Years later, when five disciples and descendants of Ten Tigers meet one night, one of them is killed by the son of the late Ching official who returns with a vengeance. They must fight against him to protect the Ten Tigers clan…

programme.title: The Thundering Sword
programme.desc: Two disciples, Yu and Zheng, are sent by their master to track down the invincible weapon “Thundering Sword” to prevent villains from getting it. Yu encounters the daughter of a ruthless clan, Chiao, who is on her way to seek for the sword. They quickly fall for each other, but when Chiao accidentally injures Zheng, things become complicated.

programme.title: The Black Lizard
programme.desc: Young swordsman Lung Fei encounters strange omens portending the death of his fiancé. His enquiries with the help of Chief Constable Tieh Hu reveal an astounding story, in this tale of men and women struggling to save their true loves.

programme.title: The Silver Fox
programme.desc: The formidable swordswoman Silver Fox was a child when her father was senselessly wounded by his step brother, and her mother raped. It is payback time eighteen years later, as her father trains her up with kung fu to take revenge on his behalf.

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This side-splitting comedy sees naive Ah Niu headed to Hong Kong, where he is repeatedly exploited and taken advantage of, and eventually finds himself arrested and imprisoned! Can he survive difficult times and finally overcome adversity?

programme.title: The Chinese Boxer
programme.desc: A noble martial arts student, whose master and peers are murdered by a bloodthirsty karate expert, embarks on a tough training regime so as to avenge them.

programme.title: Crocodile River
programme.desc: This story has a Romeo and Juliet flavour. Two families who hate each other live across the opposite sides of a river filled with crocodiles and do not bother to have a bridge built. Their respective children meet in university and fall in love, but have to find ways to be together and resolve the hatred between their families.

programme.title: Death Duel
programme.desc: Third Master is a renowned swordsman in the martial arts world, but the constant challenges by other swordsmen compel him to fake his death and pursue a secluded life. This does not prevent others from seeking him out to challenge him however, and he is forced to return to fight his way till the end.

programme.title: The Three Smiles
programme.desc: A talented scholar, Bo Hu, is attracted by the pretty maid, Qiu Xiang. In order to get close to her and win her love, he disguises as a servant to work in the same household. Qiu Xiang does not believe Bo Hu when he discloses his true identity to her, only falling in love with him when he reveals his talents and with his friends’ help.

programme.title: The Magnificent Swordsman
programme.desc: The Magnificent Swordsman centres on the hero who vows vengeance against evil bandits who killed his family when he was a child. The hero recruits several friends to help the peasants rid their village of marauding bandits, the leader of the band being the man who killed his family.

programme.title: Apartment for Ladies
programme.desc: A Taiwanese singer comes to Hong Kong in search for her missing younger sister, who had arrived in Hong Kong to be discovered as a nightclub singer. She finds lodging at an apartment for women run by a man-hating landlady, Mrs Chan. However, Mrs Chan cannot confine the young ladies’ youthful vitality within the apartment.

programme.title: The Boxer From The Temple
programme.desc: A young monk, The Kid, was expelled from the temple due to his crazy ways. After leaving the temple, he fights a cruel bandit's son and befriends a prostitute. As he fights for justice, his “Crazy Lo Han Fist” improves with every fight.

programme.title: Thirunaal
programme.desc: Blade, a henchman for a local gangster, Naaga, falls in love with Vidhya, the daughter of a factory owner. He has to choose between supporting her father and his boss, who are rivals.

programme.title: Rekka
programme.desc: Shiva, who is known for helping couples elope, is forced to kidnap a politician's daughter by a gangster, David, after he stops his wedding to a girl who did not want to marry him.

programme.title: Akhanda
programme.desc: To save the saviour Murali Krishna from an evil Varadarajulu's trap, Lord Shiva's ardent devotee, Akhanda, moves heaven and earth.

programme.title: The Priest
programme.desc: A priest and a police officer are trying to solve a set of mysterious suicides. As their investigation closes in, they discover another crime with even farther-reaching consequences.

programme.title: Jai Hind 2
programme.desc: One man's fight to give good education to the poor.

programme.title: Aghavan
programme.desc: A police officer works undercover in Brihadeeswarar Temple in Thanjavur to protect its treasure from criminals who plan to loot the temple.

programme.title: Dhilukku Dhuddu 2
programme.desc: In a bid to escape from Viji's antics, his neighbours lure him to fall in love with Maya. However, everything turns upside down when he realises that a ghost is protecting Maya.

programme.title: Dikkilona
programme.desc: When Mani, a lineworker who is unhappy in his marriage, manages to make a time machine work due to an accident, he goes back in time to change his life.

programme.title: Mohini
programme.desc: Vaishnavi and Sandeep, a couple, are engaged to be married soon. However, things spiral out of control when she get possessed by her dead lookalike, who thirsts for revenge against Sandeep.

programme.title: Kedi Billa Killadi Ranga
programme.desc: The story of two loafing friends, who want to enter politics.

programme.title: Vaazhl
programme.desc: Prakash, a love-struck IT professional, ends up badly entangled in the life of a married woman who is on the run with her son after having murdered her abusive husband.

programme.title: Vetrivel
programme.desc: A brother attempts to get his younger brother married to the girl he loves by kidnapping her, but the plan goes so wrong and results in messy situations.

programme.title: Oh My Kadavule
programme.desc: Two childhood friends, Anu and Arjun, decide to get married. However, their marital life becomes complicated due to misunderstandings and miscommunications.

programme.title: Kadaisi Nodigal
programme.desc: When a psychotic murderer sets out on a killing spree, Samuel, a medico-legal advisor, uses his forensic skills to unravel the truth behind the heinous deeds.

programme.title: Vaa Arugil Vaa
programme.desc: An unlucky young woman is married off to a man who thinks she is from a rich family. The groom's family tries everything to throw her out of the house.

programme.title: Wild Dog
programme.desc: A series of deadly attacks occur that pose a threat to national security. In response, a brash but brilliant intelligence agent leads a covert operation to find the perpetrators.

programme.title: Freeticket
programme.desc: The host presents a comprehensive compilation of songs and snippets from some of the most popular and trending Tamil movies.

programme.title: Lakshmi
programme.desc: Lakshmi dreams of winning a national level dance competition but is scared to participate as her mother despises dancing. However, things take a turn when she meets Krishna, a cafe owner.

programme.title: Veetla Visesham
programme.desc: Elango, a 26-year-old man, is shocked to discover that his mother is pregnant. His struggle to come to terms with the news puts his relationship with his girlfriend, Sowmya, in jeopardy.

programme.title: Maragatha Naanayam
programme.desc: A young man races to find a legendary treasure which causes him many troubles.

programme.title: Kuttram 23
programme.desc: ACP Vetrimaaran unravels a crime racket involving medical professionals. However, his task becomes harder every day as the case becomes murkier and complex.

programme.title: Rajini Murugan
programme.desc: The story revolves around Rajini Murugan, an unemployed youth who is heir to his grandfather’s property. Rajini falls in love with Karthika but faces opposition from her father.

programme.title: Karnan
programme.desc: Karnan, a fearless village youth, must fight for the rights of the conservative people of his village, due to the torture given by a police officer.

programme.title: Ainthu Ainthu Ainthu
programme.desc: Aravind unexpectedly loses his beloved girlfriend in a car accident. The strangest thing happens after the accident when people around him tell him no such person ever existed.

programme.title: Baywatch

programme.desc: The Beating - Jamie stumbles upon unsettling news about his past, while Kayce tracks a cattle rustler. Beth joins forces with a lawyer to help stave off the corporate raiders closing in.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S3) Ep8
programme.desc: I Killed a Man Today - Beth fires back against their financial adversary by shorting their stock, sending it plummeting. Monica assists authorities as missing person cases start mounting. Wade sends John Dutton a message.

programme.title: How To Lose a Guy in 10 Days
programme.desc: Andie Anderson, agrees to write a firsthand account of all the things women do to drive away men, she has to find a guy, make him fall in love with her, then get dumped all in 10 days.

programme.title: The Daddy Offensive
programme.desc: Markus, who has always wanted a family, is overjoyed when his holiday fling Lena becomes pregnant. Her father strongly disapproves of him and when he turns up for his birthday, a hilarious showdown ensues between Markus and his future father-in-law.

programme.title: Commitment Asli
programme.desc: Asli is a young mother struggling to reconcile her commitments as a mother and wife with her professional career. She hires Gulnihal, a nanny and a fellow mother, but whose arrival forces Asli to confront the secrets she has been avoiding.

programme.title: The Best Of Dorien B.
programme.desc: 37-year old Dorien seemed to have a perfect life - she has a flourishing veterinary practice, two sweet kids and a successful husband. After everything suddenly fell apart, she must rediscover herself in order to escape the chaos which is now her life.

programme.title: The Wedding Misplanner
programme.desc: Two in-laws have clashing ideas on the best wedding arrangement for their engaged children. Claudia, the groom’s mother, wants a small intimate affair while Herb, the bride’s father, wants a pompous ceremony. Peace is shattered, and all hell breaks loose.

programme.title: Patchwork Family
programme.desc: Christian is a divorced father who can only see his young daughter Vanessa every other weekend. When he meets the single mother Christine and decides to participate in a summer TV show, his whole life is turned upside down.

programme.title: Roxanne
programme.desc: Twenty years after the Romanian Revolution, Tavi finds out from his secret police file that he might have a son he had not known about. In his search for the truth, Tavi gets caught up in his complicated past which threatens to mess up his current life.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Silent Night
programme.desc: The owner of the historic Sylt company Betten-Reuter, is found dead and two infamous Santa Clauses are believed to have silenced him. Known for robbery, is the notorious pair really also capable of murder?

programme.title: Dear Lemon Lima,
programme.desc: A bildungsroman of sorts, this film is the story of Vanessa, a 13 year old girl who, upon discovering her Eskimo heritage, bands together with her misfit friends to compete in the school’s notorious winter competition so as to impress her crush.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Most Beautiful Day
programme.desc: As the tide off Sylt starts to recede, a car emerges with a dead man behind the wheel. The driver, Stefan, did not drown. He was poisoned. Stefan was a wedding videographer, but he also had a very lucrative side business – blackmailing brides and grooms.

programme.title: Flesh Out
programme.desc: Aligned to the tradition of Mauritanian culture, young Verida’s impending arranged marriage means that she has to start gavage – a ritual of over-eating in order to gain a voluptuous body. Meal after meal, she feels increasingly estranged from her own body and starts to question her willful obedience to such rules.

programme.title: Tim Burton's Corpse Bride
programme.desc: Returning to the painstaking stop-motion animation he employed with amazing success in The Nightmare Before Christmas, Tim Burton presents a hair-raising legend based on a 19th-century Russian folktale, in which a young man mistakenly weds a corpse while on a two-day trek to the village of his real bride-to-be. It is up to the groom's flesh-and-blood fiancée, who has been pining for the arrival of her intended, to face her wraith-like rival and make peace with her by promising to live her dreams for her and by vowing to remember her always. Only then are the living bride and groom free to proceed with their own wedding ceremony in the warmhearted fable Tim Burton's Corpse Bride.

programme.desc: Lois spots Morgan Edge conversing with Kyle and Mayor Dean. Meanwhile, Jonathan is having mixed emotions about Jordan’s newfound status.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S1 5
programme.desc: As Smallville celebrates its first Harvest Festival since Martha's passing, Clark is reminded what his mother meant to him and learns a lesson that will help him move past her death.

programme.title: Container Wars S3 4
programme.desc: Bidders go head to head in a battle over some super heavyweight freight, a can filled to the brim with outdoor adventure equipment contains a unique surprise, and a tailgaters dream could stop its winner short of the goal line.

programme.title: Container Wars S3 5
programme.desc: The Israelis' go hard after what they think is vintage clothing, but will their fashion expertise pay off? Mo and Ty go postal when the doors swing open to reveal some mysterious machinery, and a custom container could land at least one buyer behindbars.

programme.title: Container Wars S3 6
programme.desc: The auction turns into a circus when four containers bound for Russia's Winter Games miss the boat. A waterlogged container piques everyone's interest, but can anything inside be salvaged? Plus, a Major League Baseball player gives Mo & Ty the lowdown on a state-of-the art piece of gym equipment

programme.title: Container Wars S3 7
programme.desc: The Israelis hang ten on a sweet beach can, but one surprise item may send them off the lot in search of major dollars. Plus, Jason strikes on a container full of wood and weird gear, but will his investment land him in the gutter? And later, a mystery door may check one team into a big loss.

programme.title: Container Wars S3 8
programme.desc: Hot items from New Orleans spice up the bidding, but will the cans bring in the green? Or will a voodoo curse make its mark? Plus, a refrigerated unit sends chills down bidders' spines when they discover its intended recipient is incarcerated.

programme.title: The Mentalist S7 13
programme.desc: In the series finale episode, Lisbon accepts Jane's surprise marriage proposal, but a killer's quest for revenge may cost them the happy ending they've worked so hard to achieve.

programme.title: Friends S6 11
programme.desc: Janine forces Joey to choose between her and his friends. Rachel buys an apothecary table from a store that Phoebe abhors.

programme.title: Friends S6 12
programme.desc: Chandler is upset when a men's magazine prints Ross' cartoon; both Chandler and Ross claim to have originated the joke.

programme.title: Friends S6 13
programme.desc: Rachel tries to help her pampered younger sister, Jill, find independence--but Jill flirting with Ross is not part of the plan.

programme.title: Friends S6 14
programme.desc: Angry that Rachel interfered in her relationship with Ross, Jill sets out to seduce him.

programme.title: Friends S6 15
programme.desc: Contemplating how differently their lives could have turned out, the friends fantasize about possibilities.

programme.title: Gotham S1 6
programme.desc: When a killer begins targeting the first born of Gotham’s elite, Bullock is forced to confront traumatic memories from a nearly identical case he worked in the past.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 14
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Q, and Murr ham it up behind the counter of a famous NYC deli, and head to Union Square where they break the ice with bizarre behavior while selling popsicles. And tonight's loser wishes Bingo wasn't his name-o in a humiliating and cringe-worthy punishment.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 15
programme.desc: Joe, Q, Murr, and Sal are forced to get cheeky with interviewers and explain their lackluster resumes while trying to land a job at a mobile company. And tonight's loser witnesses a joining in matrimony that's anything but holy.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 16
programme.desc: Joe, Q, Murr, and Sal are forced to get cheeky with interviewers and explain their lackluster resumes while trying to land a job at a mobile company. And tonight's loser witnesses a joining in matrimony that's anything but holy.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S7 01
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr, and Q take their talents to Miami for the season premiere, pulling all new pranks on the beach. The guys zip around in scooters controlled by the other Jokers, and the loser will come face-to-face with an alligator.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S7 02
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr, and Q teach fencing, and one Joker is especially "en garde" when forced to face an Olympian. The guys trim away their dignity as hairstylists, and the punished Joker melts down during a presentation on climate change.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 11
programme.desc: Sheldon plans an authentic Little House on the Prairie dinner for Amy's birthday, while Leonard laments his own lack of accomplishments at Christmastime.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 12
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy subject their friends to a series of secret experiments to discover who would be the most qualified to be Best Man and Maid of Honor at their wedding.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 13
programme.desc: While Penny helps Sheldon figure out his next move in science, Bert, the geologist, replaces Howard in his band, "Footprints on the Moon."

programme.title: Young Sheldon S6 12
programme.desc: Mary butts heads with Mandy’s mother, and Sheldon attempts male bonding.

programme.title: Kung Fu S3 9

programme.title: My Best Friend's Wedding
programme.desc: See why there’s nothing like an ex-girlfriend determined to get back the man she loves - even if it means wrecking her best friend’s wedding. Stars Julia Roberts, Rupert Everett.

programme.title: Pride And Prejudice Ep06
programme.desc: Episode 6 - Lydia and Wickham come to Longbourn for a visit before joining Wickham’s new regiment in the North. She is as silly as ever and very proud of her success in catching Wickham.

programme.title: Are You Being Served? S5 Ep02
programme.desc: A Change is as Good as a Rest - Changes to staffing arrangements at Grace Brothers lead to fun and games.

programme.title: The Lucy Show S6 Ep07
programme.desc: Lucy, the Philanthropist - Lucy befriends a kindly old man, Mr. Snowden, she finds sitting on a bench in Griffith Park. At first, Mr. Mooney shuns snowden but when he is led to believe that the old man is an eccentric millionaire, goes all out to make him comfortable and happy, much to Lucy's chagrin.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S6 Ep10
programme.desc: Haunted - Detective Tutuola's past catches up with him when a grief-stricken mother blames him for her daughter's drug abuse. Fin teams up with a young narcotics detective and sets out to make things right.

programme.title: Buffy The Vampire Slayer S2 Ep21
programme.desc: Becoming, Part 1 - Kendra returns to help Buffy when Angel plots to revive an ancient demon bent on sweeping everything on Earth into Hell itself.

programme.title: Bonanza S1 Ep01
programme.desc: A Rose for Lotta - Silver barons hire Lotta Crabtree, famous entertainer of the time, to lure Little Joe Cartright from the Ponderosa into Virginia City.

programme.title: Bonanza S1 Ep02
programme.desc: The Sun Mountain Herd - A pair of greedy opportunists kill antelope on Indian grounds and sell them to Virginia's city silver miners for a large profit.

programme.title: Are You Being Served? S5 Ep03
programme.desc: Founder’s Day - Young Mr Grace is turning 80 and Mr Rumbold asks the staff to come up with ideas for celebrating it. They steal his memoirs and perform a This Is Your Life-style surprise called This Is Your Department.

programme.title: Remington Steele S1 Ep13
programme.desc: A Good Night's Steele - Laura poses as a doctor and Remington poses as a patient at a hospital in order to discover why a female physician disappeared and morphine keeps disappearing.

programme.title: The Lucy Show S6 Ep08
programme.desc: Lucy Sues Mooney - While doing some work for Mooney at his home, Lucy slips and falls. Her friend Mary Jane insists that the redhead should sue Mooney and puts Lucy in touch with her lawyer cousin, William Wiley, who tricks lucy into suing her boss.

programme.title: Little House On The Prairie S9 Ep12
programme.desc: Marvin's Garden - Dr. Marvin Haynes has been practicing in Walnut Grove, but his failing eyesight prevents him from renewing his license, leaving him angry and depressed over the loss of his career.

programme.title: Love Locks Ep01
programme.desc: - - Twenty years after she was last in Paris, a woman returns to the City of Light, where she reconnects with her college boyfriend and first love.

programme.desc: Hearts of Steele - To help protect their client, a high-powered divorce lawyer, Remington and Laura pose as an unhappy couple about to get divorced.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S6 Ep11
programme.desc: Contagious - A medical exam of a girl who survived a car accident reveals that she was a victim of sexual abuse. Out of fear and desperation, she ends up blaming the wrong suspect.

programme.title: The Scarlet Pimpernel Ep01
programme.desc: Part 1 of 2 - During the turmoil of the French Revolution, English aristocrat Percy Blakeney, often aided by his League of friends, secretly undertakes various daring missions as the Scarlet Pimpernel.

programme.title: The Scarlet Pimpernel Ep02
programme.desc: Part 2 of 2 - During the turmoil of the French Revolution, English aristocrat Percy Blakeney, often aided by his League of friends, secretly undertakes various daring missions as the Scarlet Pimpernel.

programme.title: The Casebook Of Sherlock Holmes Ep01
programme.desc: The Disappearance of Lady Frances - Watson writes to Holmes telling him of the other guests at his hotel in the Lakes. Sailing back from church across the lake, Lady Frances Carfax falls out of the boat and is rescued by a mysterious person.

programme.title: Small Wonder S4 Ep15
programme.desc: Radio Days - Ted prepares for a robotics interview on a local radio talk show while Jamie looks for an idea for a class play.

programme.title: Small Wonder S4 Ep16
programme.desc: Kid-O-Grams - Jamie and Reggie start a singing telegram business with Vicki singing the telegrams. Meanwhile Ted starts having a midlife crisis after his birthday.

programme.title: Small Wonder S4 Ep17
programme.desc: More About Les - L.E.S. is back, and despite Ted's assurances that the rogue A.I. program has been rendered harmless, it comes back in a big way by possessing Vicki's body as its own.

programme.title: Little House On The Prairie S9 Ep08
programme.desc: Return Of Nellie - The Oleson’s are thrilled to learn that Nellie is returning home for a visit, but Nancy is not pleased about sharing the spotlight.

programme.title: Little House On The Prairie S9 Ep09
programme.desc: The Empire Builders - Having a railroad built to pass directly through Walnut Grove sounds like a wonderful idea for many town residents, particularly since it would increase the size and popularity of the area.

programme.title: Little House On The Prairie S9 Ep10
programme.desc: Love Story - Laura’s childhood friend, Jane Canfield, comes back to Walnut Grove. Despite being blind, she develops a fondness for Isaiah Edwards (who is twice her age) and the two fall in love. Jane’s vision is restored when she receives eye surgery. Isaiah is hopeful about building a future with her, but negative input from his friends turn this into one of the most difficult decisions of his life.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S11 Ep13
programme.desc: Friends and Enemies - One of Potter’s oldest friends, Col. Woody Cooke of I-Corps, is amongst the wounded who arrive at the 4077th. Cooke's wounds are minor but there are a lot of serious casualties amongst his men. When Hawkeye and B.J. make the discovery that the men were injured due to Cooke’s error they break the news to Potter. Potter is angered and refuses to believe them until he investigates the story and finds it is true. When he confronts Cooke about the incident, Cooke asks Potter to cover the whole thing up for him. Potter refuses and loses his oldest friend but he also realizes what good friends he has in Hawkeye and B.J.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S11 Ep14
programme.desc: Give and Take - Charles has been made the 4077th’s charity collection officer and has been lees than productive in his endeavors, so Potter gives him a firm tongue lashing and a 24-hour deadline to make his collection quota. Charles passes the responsibility to Hot Lips by bribing her with a book she has been wanting. Hot Lips in turn gives the job to B.J. in exchange for darning his socks, which to her surprise is a huge pile. B.J., on the other hand, flat-out blackmails Hawkeye into taking the job, while Hawkeye ends up cataloging medical supplies so Klinger will do the collecting. While everyone shirks the responsibility of charity, a young soldier expresses regrets about injuring a Chinese soldier who tried to steal the American’s boot to help his frostbitten feet.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S11 Ep15
programme.desc: As Time Goes By - Hot Lips wants to make a time capsule for the 4077th M*A*S*H unit as a reminder of the role that the unit played in the Korean War, but receives a tepid response from the group. Meanwhile, Sergeant Rizzo is seeking revenge for pranks gone by and has a dummy hand grenade to help him, but Charles and B.J. still get the best of him in the end. Hot Lips is pleasantly surprised when everyone comes through with contributions for the time capsule. It turns out that people put some thought into what items to donate and the whole capsule turns out to be a wonderful and touching success.

Charles passes the responsibility to Hot Lips by bribing her with a book she has been wanting. Hot Lips in turn gives the job to B.J. in exchange for darning his socks, which to her surprise is a huge pile. B.J., on the other hand, flat-out blackmails Hawkeye into taking the job, while Hawkeye ends up cataloging medical supplies so Klinger will do the collecting. While everyone shirks the responsibility of charity, a young soldier expresses regrets about injuring a Chinese soldier who tried to steal the American’s boot to help his frostbitten feet.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S11 Ep15
programme.desc: As Time Goes By - Hot Lips wants to make a time capsule for the 4077th M*A*S*H unit as a reminder of the role that the unit played in the Korean War, but receives a tepid response from the group. Meanwhile, Sergeant Rizzo is seeking revenge for pranks gone by and has a dummy hand grenade to help him, but Charles and B.J. still get the best of him in the end. Hot Lips is pleasantly surprised when everyone comes through with contributions for the time capsule. It turns out that people put some thought into what items to donate and the whole capsule turns out to be a wonderful and touching success.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S11 Ep16
programme.desc: Goodbye, Farewell and Amen - GOODBYE, FAREWELL AND AMEN is the final episode of the long-running and acclaimed series M*A*S*H, about doctors in a mobile M*A*S*H medical unit during the Korean War.

programme.title: The Casebook Of Sherlock Holmes Ep02
programme.desc: The Problem of Thor Bridge - Maria Gibson, finding only rejection from her husband, arranges to meet the children's Governess, Grace Dunbar, at Thor Bridge. Maria is shot on the bridge and Grace is accused of her murder.

programme.title: The Hound of the Baskervilles - Sherlock Holmes Ep01

programme.desc: Military lawyer Lieutenant Daniel Kaffee defends Marines accused of murder. They contend they were acting under orders.

programme.title: Wild China S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Tides of Change - With splendour, scale and romance, Wild China lifts the veil on the world's most enigmatic and magnificent country, delving into its vibrant habitats to reveal a land of unbelievable natural complexity. Journey across China from the glittering peaks of the Himalayas to the barren steppe, the sub-Arctic to the tropical islands, through deserts both searingly hot and mind-numbingly cold and see, in pioneering images, a dazzling array of mysterious, beautiful, wild and rare creatures.

programme.desc: Kinship - The drama now centres around the river where enchanting new characters, such as an adorable baby hippo, meet old favourites. Bonds of kinship are tested as adventures continue.

programme.title: Primates S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Protecting Primates - Today, more than half of the world's primates are under threat of extinction. Meet the scientists making groundbreaking discoveries about this remarkable animal family.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Snows of Kilimanjaro Ep4
programme.desc: Mt. Kilimanjaro is the highest freestanding peak in Africa, it has five separate climatic zones. Jean Du Plessis is making his first climb to the peak. His mission is to see whether climate change is affecting the snow on the top of the mountain.

programme.title: Over Australia 1 - The Great Divide Ep2
programme.desc: Created by titanic forces and spanning 3,700 km along the eastern edge of Australia, the Great Dividing Range separates two very different worlds. Aerial footage and intimate studies reveal how species survive and thrive in this mountain home.

programme.title: The Great Elephant Tale
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of three elephants across three very distinct African habitats. Their travels combine to tell the story of how these emotional and intelligent creatures evolved over millions of years to survive on the continent.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 - Children of the Storm Ep3
programme.desc: In Iceland only one out of six cubs has survived. Abandoned by her parents, she now has to fend for herself. The reindeer herd swim two miles across open water. In Scotland, 35,000 grey seals arrive for their annual breeding season.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - The Fickle River Ep1
programme.desc: Travel to Samburu, where matriarch Anastasia turns her elephant herd north after a local river dries up. Then, in Naboisho, see cheetah mom Kuleta evade a crafty pack of hyenas. Later, in Laikipia, check in on wild dog Phoenix and her new litter.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Human Influenced Ep2
programme.desc: In geological and biological scales, humans have only been around for the blink of an eye, and yet we’ve managed to influence the evolutionary path for many animals. Explore the human impact on dogs, wolves, coyotes, elephants, and more.

programme.title: Wild Rockies 1 - Group Survival Ep5
programme.desc: For a great many species, the structures of group living are the most important for survival. Although social living is integral to many of the animals that call the Rocky Mountains home, no two species organize their society in the same way. Even among closely related species there can be drastic differences in social structure; communication, hierarchy, mating, and diet are all inextricably informed by specific environmental and genetic adaptations for group survival.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Ngorongoro Ep3
programme.desc: Explores the Ngorogoro’s highlands and caldera on the edge of the Serengeti. The caldera is a wildlife haven that some have called a modern day Eden because of the density and diversity of its wildlife. That includes some of the last of Africa’s “tuskers.”

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Snows of Kilimanjaro Ep4
programme.desc: Mt. Kilimanjaro is the highest freestanding peak in Africa, it has five separate climatic zones. Jean Du Plessis is making his first climb to the peak. His mission is to see whether climate change is affecting the snow on the top of the mountain.

programme.title: Over Australia 1 - The Great Divide Ep2
programme.desc: Created by titanic forces and spanning 3,700 km along the eastern edge of Australia, the Great Dividing Range separates two very different worlds. Aerial footage and intimate studies reveal how species survive and thrive in this mountain home.

programme.title: The Great Elephant Tale
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of three elephants across three very distinct African habitats. Their travels combine to tell the story of how these emotional and intelligent creatures evolved over millions of years to survive on the continent.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - The Fickle River Ep1
programme.desc: Travel to Samburu, where matriarch Anastasia turns her elephant herd north after a local river dries up. Then, in Naboisho, see cheetah mom Kuleta evade a crafty pack of hyenas. Later, in Laikipia, check in on wild dog Phoenix and her new litter.
